title: Ticket #1067: condor_rm timeout when removing many (100Ks) jobs
description:
condor_rm will occasionally fail when removing large numbers of jobs from the queue, e.g. submission of a few 100K jobs and then a condor_rm -a. 

$ time condor_rm -a

Could not remove all jobs.

real	0m20.069s
user	0m0.020s
sys	0m0.020s

This is presumably an issue with the timeout, i.e. the Schedd is not responding in time.

TOOL_TIMEOUT_MULTIPLIER can be used to reduce the likelihood of the timeout, but the user experience is poor, and TOOL_TIMEOUT_MULTIPLIER is not targetted to only condor_rm.
